Articles.Content:
Hi All! A while back I posted a survey (in this forum I think) asking people about their general usage on portable speakers for a university project. Well the project has developed greatly since then and I thought there wouldn't be any harm in reaching out to the amazing KSP community again. If you're interested in my project please check out the Facebook & Tumblr pages bellow, likes or follows are greatly appreciated!

- Hazard1556

https://www.facebook.com/environmentalaudio

http://envaudio.tumblr.com/
